Hi Nick— just passing this on, I  haven't responded, but for what it's worth this reporter contacted me at the 
email address for the law school where I teach a small class, which I didn't appreciate. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: Philippe BERRY • 
Date: Februa 6 2020 at 4:58:20 PM GMT+1 
To: 
Subject: Epstein and US/French international justice (journalist question) 
Hi I'm the US correspondent for 20 Minutes, a French newspaper. 
I'm working on a Epstein    iece, and I  had some questions (it can be 100% of the 
record or 
purely for background) about how such a case work between US/French judicial authorities when key events 
and players are linked to several countries. 
Could I call you to talk about it? 
Thank you so 
much, 
Philippe 
Philippe Berry Correspondant ma Etats-Uni4
